title: RBI Monetary Policy Highlights: MPC cuts repo rate by 25 bps, shifts stance to accommodative; trims GDP growth forecast
description: RBI Repo Rate News Highlights: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) announced its first bi-monthly monetary policy of FY26 today, April 9.
